con:resource.name: /workspaces
con:resource.con:description: All resources are "namespaced" by the workspace (aka branch).

con:resource.name: /{workspaceId}
con:resource.con:description: Read operations for workspaces

con:parameter.con:name: workspaceId
con:parameter.con:description: Workspace ID under consideration. "master" is always defined and is the "trunk" workspace to whih all other workspaces should be merged. "master" is what is contained at the Alfresco sites level.

con:resource.name: /{artifactId}
con:resource.con:description: Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations for artifacts

con:representation.con:description: artifacts append successful
artifacts append started, but not yet completed
User does not have write permissions to artifacts
artifacts not found
artifacts conflict detected (e.g., intervening update occurred between when user accessed resource and when user saved resource)
Could not append to artifacts due to internal server error
artifacts update successful
artifacts create successful
artifacts create/update started, but not yet completed
User does not have create/update permissions to artifacts
artifacts not found
artifacts conflict detected (e.g., intervening update occurred between when user accessed resource and when user updated resource)
Could not append to artifacts due to internal server error
artifacts delete successful
artifacts delete started, but not yet completed
User does not have delete permissions to artifacts
artifacts not found
Could not delete artifacts due to internal server error

con:parameter.con:name: recurse
con:parameter.con:description: If true, finds all elements recursively based on containment hierarchy

con:parameter.con:name: recurseDepth
con:parameter.con:description: Recurse depth. 0 specifies infinite recursion (e.g., until all leaf nodes are found).

con:parameter.con:name: search
con:parameter.con:description: Regular expression of the search to be executed at the specified scope. Currently search is against id, name, documentation, body.

con:parameter.con:name: type
con:parameter.con:description: Filter results based on specified type

con:parameter.con:name: timestamp
con:parameter.con:description: Timestamp to find most recent version of artifacts, specified in ISO8601 time format.

con:representation.con:description: artifacts read successful
Malformed request by client
User does not have read permissions to artifacts
artifacts not found
Could not read artifacts due to internal server error

con:resource.name: /sites
con:resource.con:description: Read operations for sites

con:parameter.con:name: siteId
con:parameter.con:description: Alfresco site identifier for the project under consideration

con:resource.name: /configurations

con:parameter.con:name: configurationId
con:parameter.con:description: ID for the configuration under consideration

con:parameter.con:name: recurse
con:parameter.con:description: If true, finds all elements recursively based on containment hierarchy

con:parameter.con:name: recurseDepth
con:parameter.con:description: Recurse depth. 0 specifies infinite recursion (e.g., until all leaf nodes are found).

con:parameter.con:name: search
con:parameter.con:description: Regular expression of the search to be executed at the specified scope. Currently search is against id, name, documentation, body.

con:method.name: post
con:method.con:description: Aspect for resources that are or can be constrained

con:parameter.con:name: fix
con:parameter.con:description: If true, fixes the constraint as scoped by the element (defaults false)

con:parameter.con:name: validate
con:parameter.con:description: If true, validates the constraint as scoped by the element (defaults false). If specified with fix, overrides fix

con:representation.con:description: elements append successful
elements append started, but not yet completed
User does not have write permissions to elements
elements not found
elements conflict detected (e.g., intervening update occurred between when user accessed resource and when user saved resource)
Could not append to elements due to internal server error

con:parameter.con:description: if specified, indicates deregistration, otherwise if not specified, always registration or update
